kc-mode.description: The time mode of keychain instance.

time-zone.description: The time zone of keychain instance.

digest-len-sha256.description: The digest length of SHA-256 algorithm.

digest-len-hmac-sha256.description: The digest length of HMAC-SHA-256 algorithm.

digest-len-hmac-sha120.description: The digest length of HMAC-SHA1-20 algorithm.

recv-tolerance.description: The receive tolerance value in minutes for a keychain, 0 means that time is infinite.

kc-tcp.description: Configure the parameter for TCP enhanced authentication option. The corresponding keychain must have been created.

abs-key-ids.description: List of absolute time mode key-id.

abs-key-id.description: Configure absolute time mode key-id instance. The corresponding keychain must have been created.

algorithm.description: The algorithm that should be associated to the key-id.

default-send-key-id.description: Enable/disable the default send key-id of keychain instance. A keychain instance can have only one key-id as the default send key-id.

abs-send-start-date.description: Date for the key-id start to be send activity, the combination of abs-send-start-date and abs-send-start-time must be earlier than that of abs-send-end-date and abs-send-end-time.

abs-send-start-time.description: Time for the key-id start to be send activity, the combination of abs-send-start-date and abs-send-start-time must be earlier than that of abs-send-end-date and abs-send-end-time.

abs-recv-start-date.description: Date for the key-id start to be receive activity, the combination of abs-recv-start-date and abs-recv-start-time must be earlier than that of abs-recv-end-date and abs-recv-end-time.

abs-recv-start-time.description: Time for the key-id start to be receive activity, the combination of abs-recv-start-date and abs-recv-start-time must be earlier than that of abs-recv-end-date and abs-recv-end-time.

end-by-duration.description: End the keychain instance by duration.

send-duration.description: Duration of the key-id keep send active, 0 means that time is infinite.

end-by-specified-time.description: End the keychain instance by specified-time.

abs-send-end-date.description: Date for the key-id stop to be send activity, the combination of abs-send-start-date and abs-send-start-time must be earlier than that of abs-send-end-date and abs-send-end-time.

abs-send-end-time.description: Time for the key-id stop to be send activity, the combination of abs-send-start-date and abs-send-start-time must be earlier than that of abs-send-end-date and abs-send-end-time.

end-by-duration.description: End the keychain instance by duration.

recv-duration.description: Duration of the key-id keep receive active, 0 means that time is infinite.

end-by-specified-time.description: End the keychain instance by specified-time.

abs-recv-end-date.description: Date for the key-id stop to be receive activity, the combination of abs-recv-start-date and abs-recv-start-time must be earlier than that of abs-recv-end-date and abs-recv-end-time.

abs-recv-end-time.description: Time for the key-id stop to be receive activity, the combination of abs-recv-start-date and abs-recv-start-time must be earlier than that of abs-recv-end-date and abs-recv-end-time.
